title: Woman Arrested in San Francisco Uber Attack: Police
author: NBC Bay Area
description:
A suspect has been arrested in connection with the assault and robbery of an Uber driver in San Francisco who refused three women a ride after seeing one of them not wearing a mask, police announced Thursday.

localize.description:
警方周四宣布，一名嫌疑人因涉嫌在旧金山殴打和抢劫一名Uber司机而被捕，该名司机在看到其中一名司机没有戴口罩后拒绝了三名女性的搭车。

localize.description:
警方週四宣佈，一名嫌疑人因涉嫌在舊金山毆打和搶劫一名Uber司機而被捕，該名司機在看到其中一名司機沒有戴口罩後拒絕了三名女性的搭車。
